mapper.insert: insert into user(user_name, user_id, user_password, user_email, user_phone, reg_dt) values ( #{userName}, #{userId}, #{userPassword}, #{userEmail}, #{userPhone}, now())
mapper.update: update user set user_password = #{userPassword} where user_id = #{userId}
mapper.select: select count(user_id) from user where user_id= #{userId}

SELECT u.user_seq, user_name, user_id, user_password, user_email, user_phone, u.reg_dt, f.file_url user_profileimage, code from user u LEFT JOIN user_img_file f ON u.user_seq = f.user_seq where user_id = #{userId}
select user_name, user_id, user_email from user where user_id = #{userId}
mapper.update: update user set user_password = #{userPassword} where user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: insert into user_img_file ( user_seq, file_name, file_size, file_content_type, file_url, reg_dt ) values ( #{userSeq}, #{fileName}, #{fileSize}, #{fileContentType}, #{fileUrl}, now() )
mapper.select: (select user_name, user_id, user_email, u.user_seq, u.user_phone, f.file_url user_profileimage from user u left join user_img_file f ON u.user_seq = f.user_seq where user_id like concat(#{userId}, '%')) union all (select user_name, user_id, user_email, u.user_seq, u.user_phone, f.file_url user_profileimage from user u left join user_img_file f ON u.user_seq = f.user_seq where user_name like concat(#{userName}, '%'));
